name: Solitaire Showdown
description:
Solitaire Showdown

Head to the beach for a real Solitaire Showdown

Experience the classic game of Solitaire in a totally new way. Challenge your friends for real-time multiplayer action, or take part in Tournaments on beaches around the World.
Travel to wild beaches in the most famous places on Earth. Advance your Solitaire skills until you are ready to take on the World.

Play Solitaire Showdown Now!

Exciting Features:

◆ Play multiplayer solitaire live.
◆ Daily, All Time, Hall Of Fame Leader boards.
◆ Play exciting games on the beach around the world.
◆ Most people know the game, only few have mastered it.

Extra Features:

◆ Facebook connection so you can play with your friends!
◆ Cool rewards!
◆ Support on multiple devices and platforms!
◆ Play against players from around the World.
